long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
EZUnits: Auto-Convert Units on YouTube

Hello! I've created EZUnits, a handy Chrome extension that automatically translates units in YouTube videos for you. It quietly works in the background, scanning video transcripts and overlaying conversions in real-time.

What EZUnits Offers:

Auto-Detect & Convert: Effortlessly identifies and converts units mentioned in videos.
Privacy First: No data collection, just straightforward functionality.
Customizable Display: Adjust the unit system, text color, and size to your liking.
Unobtrusive Overlay: Provides information without disrupting your viewing experience.
Easy to Use: Just install, set your preferences, and it's ready to go.
Quick Setup & Use:

Install from the Chrome Web Store.
A few quick settings.
Enjoy smarter, effortless YouTube viewing.
EZUnits transforms your YouTube experience, making it more informative and convenient. Try it out and see the difference!
